abstract: Justice Dept inspector general reports Drug Enforcement Administration agents accepted gifts from drug cartels, including weapons and invites to sex parties with prostitutes, for several years in undisclosed country overseas.
lead_paragraph: Drug Enforcement Administration agents attended sex parties with prostitutes, funded by local drug cartels on government-leased property overseas, according to accounts by local police officers in a Justice Department report.

headline.main: Report Says Drug Agents Attended Sex Parties
headline.print_headline: Report Says Drug Agents Attended Sex Parties

snippet: Drug Enforcement Administration agents attended sex parties with prostitutes, funded by local drug cartels on government-leased property overseas, according to accounts by local police officers in a Justice Department report.
